summary: Request to publish and maintain a Buf schema registry for the Temporal API. The main challenge is ensuring the inlined Google dependency is not accidentally published while keeping raw protoc support functional.
userImpact: Users need easier access to Temporal API schemas through a maintained Buf schema registry for better integration and code generation workflows.
proposedFix: Publish and maintain a Buf schema registry while carefully managing the inlined Google dependency to prevent accidental inclusion.
keyQuote: we want to publish and maintain a buf schema registry... we need to make sure we don't publish the inlined google dependency
